Kashier Dashboard API

Integrate the Dashboard API into your server applications for an automated experience without the need for manual dashboard operations, it lets you Create and Share Invoices, syncing your inventory with product pages, Refunds and other Kashier Dashboard Capabilities.
Kashier Payments

Integrate secure payment processing capabilities into your web and mobile applications, Kashier offers Prebuilt IFrame, Hosted Checkout Page Integration and a set of mobile SDK's for easy integration.
3rd Party Plugins

Easy plug and play ready made plugins, Kashier offers WooCommerce, Shopify, Prestashop, Magento, OpenCart, Wix, Booking BA, CS Cart, VikBooking and VikAppointments.
